references.formattedCitation: Talbert, Richard J. A., ed. Barrington Atlas of the Greek and Roman World. Princeton, N.J.: Princeton University Press, 2000. http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/43970336.

description: An ancient river mentioned only by Pausanias who describes it, along with the Koios, as lying between Andania and Kyparissia in Messenia. RE declines to identify it with a specific modern river. BAtlas 58 labels a river stretch corresponding to the middle course of the modern Mavrozoumena river as mapped and named in OpenStreetMap, but in BAtlDir the corresponding modern name / location is given as "Chouchlotos", which does not appear in GeoNames, OpenStreetMap, Wikidata, or elsewhere on the web.

properties.description: Location based on OpenStreetMap. Labeled as "Elektra" in BAtlas 58 B3.
